# 48th Golden Bell Awards

The 48th Golden Bell Awards (Mandarin:第48屆金鐘獎) was held on October 25, 2013 at Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall in Taipei, Taiwan. The ceremony was broadcast live by CTV.
